solution_line_template: If in six years Xavier will be {xavier_future_age} years old, he is {xavier_future_age}-{years_until_future_age} = <<{xavier_future_age}-{years_until_future_age}={xavier_current_age}>>{xavier_current_age} years old now.
If Xavier is twice as old as Yasmin, Yasmin is {xavier_current_age}/{age_multiplier} = <<{xavier_current_age}/{age_multiplier}={yasmin_current_age}>>{yasmin_current_age} years old.
The total of their ages now is {yasmin_current_age}+{xavier_current_age} = <<{yasmin_current_age}+{xavier_current_age}={total_current_ages}>>{total_current_ages} years
